title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Exporting a zip file is taking a long time (around 30 seconds) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process. NOTES:
OB: When updating the checked state of the table during zip file export, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) without any indication of progress. A busy cursor should be displayed during this process.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table during zip file export, the process should complete within a reasonable time frame (less than 10 seconds). Additionally, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the update is in progress.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the export feature.
2. Select multiple files to include in the zip.
3. Initiate the export process.
4. Observe the time it takes for the checked state of the table to be updated.
5. Verify that a busy cursor is displayed during this time.
